name: Ameising
description:
In Ameising you play as an ant trying to steal a delicious apple out of a strange giants nest. But an ant alone is weak so you need to recruit a squad of ants to fullfill your mission.

Credits:

Selina Stückler

Justin Mätschke

Polina Zvezdohliad

Ewa Emilia Berg

Ariana Zeyvald

Brook Tinz
